title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to focus on the first Combo, it doesn't respond as expected. Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not cause it to take focus.
EB: The expected behavior is that when clicking on the first Combo labeled 'Host:', the focus caret should be inside the input field of the Combo, allowing the user to type immediately.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Locate the first Combo labeled 'Host:'.
3. Click on the first Combo.
